mapper.select: SELECT id, stuId, subId, score FROM grade
SELECT s.id, s.name, AVG(score) AS score FROM grade g INNER JOIN student s ON g.stuId = s.id GROUP BY g.stuId
SELECT s.id, s.name, AVG(score) AS score FROM grade g INNER JOIN subject s ON g.subId = s.id GROUP BY g.subId

choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO grade (stuId, subId, score) VALUES (#{stuId}, #{subId}, #{score})
